text: Pantelis Papaterpos (born 18 March 1968) is a Greek rower. He competed in the men's double sculls event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Greek male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Greece Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Pantelis Papaterpos
